trans-unit.source: Groups a set of ribbon controls into a visual and conceptual unit.
trans-unit.target: 群組一組功能區控制項至視覺化和概念性的單位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the container for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 卸載指定的項目容器。

trans-unit.source: This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可復原的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition> contains properties that specify size and visibility information for the image and label associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>包含指定的映像和控制項相關聯的標籤的大小和可見性資訊的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> for this control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"> </xref>對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.ControlSizeDefinition*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref> container object that is used to display an item from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>容器物件，用於顯示的項目從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own container.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否指定的項目是 （或可以成為） 其本身的容器。

trans-unit.source: The item to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlGroupAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlGroupAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定的項目，以顯示指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: This method prepares a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup> to display <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl> items.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會準備<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup>顯示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup>

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來存取在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>類別</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>上定義的視覺化樣式筆刷

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>所屬這個控制項。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Ribbon*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonButton.Ribbon*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
